array.name: name
array.item: Saving Tips: Buy second-hand Books whenever it is available.
Saving Tips: Cook for yourself and rather than eating out pack your lunch.
Saving Tips: Avail Student discounts whenever it is applicable.
Saving Tips: Cut down on unnecessary spending.
Saving Tips: Do not exceed the set spending limit.
Saving Tips: Do not use credit card. Use debit, cash or mobile banking.
